dawith hana eepod sattayak palandagena sitiyeya. 28 mese siyalu ishrayelwaru olwara handath horana-shabdayath athuwa, nalawalinuth aththalwalinuth winawalinuth maha winawalinuth shabda pawathwamin, swaminwahansege giwisum pettiya genawoya. 29 swaminwahansege giwisum pettiya dawithge nuwarata paminenawita, sawulge duwu mikhal kawuluwen bala rajawu dawith paninawath natanawath daka, age sithin ohu hela dakkaya. 1 owhu dewiyanwahansege giwisum pettiya genawuth dawith wisin ee sandaha pihituwa thibunu kudarama thula thaba, dawana pujawalda shanthi pujawalda dewiyanwahanse idiriyehi oppukaloya. 2 dawith dawana pujawada shanthi pujada oppukara nimawu wita, ohu swaminwahansege namayen senangata aashirwada keleya. 3 thawada ohu ishrayel minisun siyallangen eka eka purushayatath sthriyatath rotiyakda maskallakda wiyali mudrikapala katiyakda bagin dunneya. 4 thawada swaminwahansege giwisum pettiya idiriyehi sewayakirimatath ishrayelge dewiwu swaminwahanse warnanakirimatath unwahanseta sthuthi prashansakirimatath ohu lewiwarungen samahareku niyamakeleya. 5 enam pradhaniya aasapya, ohu langata shekariya, yeyiyel, shemiramoth, yehiyel, maththithiya, eliyab, benaya, oobed-eedom saha yeyiyelya; mowhu winawalinda maha winawalinda gayanakaloya; numuth aasap aththalwalin shabda pawaththuweya; 6 pujakayowu benayada yahasiyelda dewiyanwahansege giwisum pettiya idiriyehi nitharama nala pimboya. 7 dawith aasapda ohuge sahodarayanda lawa swaminwahanseta sthuthikarawimata palamuwen niyamakele ee dawasediya. 8 swaminwahanseta sthuthikaraw, unwahansege namaya kiya yachnyakaraw; janayan athare unwahansege kriya danwaw. 9 unwahanseta githika kiyaw, unwahanseta prashansa gi kiyaw; unwahansege siyalu puduma kriya menehikaraw. 10 unwahansege shuddhawu namaya gana parattukaraganiw.
